subject: Order #SSN2476
description_text:
Hi

I received my order and when I connect the power supply to the main box for the haptics, the power cable doesn't stay in the power port. It just falls out.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi wayne burton,  Are you saying that the DC power port feels loose when the power cable is plugged in? You can try securing the plug with a zip tie to see if it helps. Alternatively, you can record a video for me to check. Please make sure the video is fully uploaded before sending it via email, otherwise we won’t be able to open it.
